# Introduction

This site aims to provide tutorials of cloud computing with Amazon Web Services (AWS). The focus is on large-scale computing for biomedical big data analytics.

- [How to run RStudio on AWS in under 3 minutes for free](https://towardsdatascience.com/how-to-run-rstudio-on-aws-in-under-3-minutes-for-free-65f8d0b6ccda)

- [Docker Containers for the R Environment](https://www.rocker-project.org/)

- [Scaling R and RStudio](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/236226087-Scaling-R-and-RStudio)

- [Using sparklyr with an Apache Spark cluster](https://spark.rstudio.com/deployment/yarn-cluster-emr.html)

- [Mastering Spark with R](https://therinspark.com/)
